name: Ozark
description: Ozark is a crime thriller about a financial planner who moves his family to the Ozarks to launder money for a drug cartel, facing danger and moral dilemmas along the way.

name: Money Heist
description: Money Heist is a Spanish crime thriller about a criminal mastermind, The Professor, who leads a group of robbers to pull off heists on the Royal Mint and Bank of Spain, using clever strategies and emotional drama to challenge the system.
cast: Álvaro Morte is a Spanish actor, best known as The Professor in Money Heist.

name: Squid Game
description: Squid Game is a South Korean survival drama where 456 people with financial struggles compete in deadly children games for a huge cash prize, revealing dark secrets about society and human nature.

name: The Crown
description: The Crown is a drama series about Queen Elizabeth II’s reign, showing her personal life and major historical events in the UK.

name: The Witcher
description: The Witcher is a fantasy series following Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter navigating a dangerous world full of magic, beasts, and political intrigue.

name: The Leopard
description: The Leopard is a historical drama set in 1860s Sicily, following a noble family's struggle during Italy’s unification. As the old world collapses, love, power, and legacy collide in this visually rich, emotionally layered Netflix series.

name: Wednesday
description: Wednesday is a supernatural mystery series about Wednesday Addams solving dark mysteries while attending Nevermore Academy.
